channel.title: KCOH Software Inc. - Latest Updates
channel.description: Stay updated with the latest projects, services, and tech insights from KCOH Software Inc. Specializing in iOS/Swift development, web applications, and custom software solutions.

item.title: MetalWorth: Precious Metals Tracking App Now Available
item.description: We're excited to announce MetalWorth - a comprehensive iOS app for tracking precious metals prices and managing your portfolio. Features include live market prices, interactive candlestick charts, portfolio management, price alerts, and multi-currency support. Perfect for collectors, jewelers, investors, and hobbyists. Available now on the App Store!
item.author: contact@kcohsoftware.com (KCOH Software Inc.)

item.title: 10+ Apps Now Available on the App Store
item.description: A major milestone for KCOH Software Inc. - we've now published over 10 applications on the Apple App Store! Our portfolio spans productivity tools, utilities, and custom business solutions, all built with Swift and SwiftUI. Thank you to our clients and users for your continued support.
item.author: contact@kcohsoftware.com (KCOH Software Inc.)

item.title: Celebrating 5 Years of Software Excellence
item.description: This month marks 5 years of KCOH Software Inc. delivering cutting-edge software solutions to clients worldwide. From web applications to iOS apps, we've maintained a 99.9% project success rate. Looking forward to many more years of innovation and collaboration!
item.author: contact@kcohsoftware.com (KCOH Software Inc.)

item.title: Enhanced Web Development Services Now Available
item.description: We've expanded our service offerings with enhanced web development capabilities including: - React & Next.js applications - Node.js backend development - Cloud deployment and hosting - Real-time features with WebSockets - RESTful API development Contact us to discuss your next project!
item.author: contact@kcohsoftware.com (KCOH Software Inc.)

item.title: UI/UX Design Tips: Creating Intuitive Mobile Interfaces
item.description: Great design is invisible. In this insight, we share our approach to creating intuitive mobile interfaces: 1. Start with user research and personas 2. Follow platform guidelines (iOS Human Interface Guidelines) 3. Prioritize simplicity and clarity 4. Use consistent visual language 5. Test with real users early and often Learn more about our design process on our services page.
item.author: contact@kcohsoftware.com (KCOH Software Inc.)
